changes: Implemented comprehensive filtering system for Parties (Customers and Vendors)
Added Quick Filters for common party filtering scenarios
Added Advanced Filter Bar with multiple filter options
Enhanced search functionality with multiple criteria
Added date range filtering for party creation
Enhanced user experience with consistent filter patterns

features.filter_system: Enhanced with improved UX and bug fixes
features.testing: Enhanced test coverage for all fixes
features.error_handling: Robust error handling and user feedback
features.products_component: Fixed all modes and improved reliability
features.dashboard: Advanced analytics with insights and trends - Layout optimized
features.ux_improvements: Enhanced user experience and interface design
features.parties_filtering: Comprehensive filtering system for customers and vendors

ux_improvements.errors: Specific error messages with retry options
ux_improvements.parties: Comprehensive filtering system with quick and advanced filters

dashboard_improvements.alignment: Fixed alignment issues for larger screens

dashboard_improvements.spacing: Improved widget spacing and visual hierarchy

parties_filtering.quick_filters: All, Active, GST, Non-GST, Recent, Outstanding
